text: 3.17: Zo 14.23; Ef 2.22; Kor 1.23; 2.7Ana nden kɨrim, nde guigira Zisas khothɨgɨrim, Zisas zazera guigira nden ndɨkndɨgi ganɨv, nde ndavi vherir kɨri. Nde maaŋ muuŋv, guigira wari won ndavir harigi ntɨɨri ga ndɨɨi tɨv havhargip, nde ndavi vherir kɨv, nde havhargirim, nde kha nuiana thɨgim, nuian ana suirav, ana havhargim, ana thɨga havhargi farar muuŋgiri.
